title: Control
alt: Which, at one point, led to a study showing that LSD produces no more hallucinations than a placebo.
transcript:
[Caption above the frame:]
My Hobby:[Cueball looks down at his arm calmly, while next to him Megan is violently flailing around in terror. In the foreground a Cueball-like guy stands next to Ponytail who is holding a clipboard. They look on in puzzlement.]
Cueball: My rash seems to have shrunk by about 20% today.
Megan: OH GOD SPIDERS
Cueball-like guy: ? ?
Ponytail: ?[Caption below the frame:]
Sneaking into experiments and 
giving LSD to the control group.
